select count(*) from like_item where mno = #{memNo} and gb_no = 1
select clno , l.mno as "mno" , cl_name , cl_price , to_char(cl_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "cl_date" , cl_img from class c join like_item l on (c.clno = l.refer_no) where l.mno = #{mno}

select c_rno , class_review.clno as "clno" , class_review.mno as "mno" , class.cl_name , content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , cl_img , case when star <= 5 and star > 4 then '★★★★★' when star <= 4 and star > 3 then '★★★★☆' when star <= 3 and star > 2 then '★★★☆☆' when star <= 2 and star > 1 then '★★☆☆☆' when star <= 1 then '★☆☆☆☆' end as star from class_review join class on (class_review.clno = class.clno) where class_review.mno = #{mno} order by c_rno desc

select pno , s.mno as "mno" , title , price , img1 , status from store s join like_item l on (s.pno = l.refer_no) where l.mno = #{memNo}

select cs_qno , cs.mno , gb_no , refer_no , cs.title , content , create_date , filepath , cs.status , answer_content , answer_date , s.title as "pro_title" from cs_qna cs join store s on ( cs.refer_no = s.pno) where cs.mno = #{memNo} and gb_no = 2 order by cs_qno desc
